Text:
Seems every time I download this movie, it had German hard-coded subs for non-English parts. Made watching it hard because you had people speaking Chinese, with German subs, with an English srt file showing subs under the German. 

Is this one the same?
No, there is no German here... hence the "PROPER" in the title. The aspect ratio is also correct on this one.
Well "Proper" has German if you lived in Germany. :D But that's good... downloaded 5 copies and all I think were re-encoded from the 3Li file.
For scene releases, a "proper" could never be German, unless you're talking original German audio for a German film, which this is not.
